boardgame.name: Billabong
High Tail It!
빌라봉
boardgame.description: In the geometrical racing game Billabong, players maneuver teams of kangaroos jumping around a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;billabong_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;a dead-end channel extending from the stream of a river,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; a term used in Australia). The board is made up of checkerboard-style squares around the billabong in the middle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On your turn, you move one of your five kangaroos, usually moving it in a jump or series of jumps over the other kangaroos. Jumps can be long; if the kangaroo to be jumped over is five spaces away, for example, the landing space will be five spaces beyond. The other option _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; to move a kangaroo just one space _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; is usually used as a positioning tactic for a subsequent move. The first player to get all five kangaroos around the billabong and over the finish line wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

I´m offering the original german edition by AMIGO +++++ new + in shrink ++++ Shipping is EUR 8.00 within Europe as also worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 5 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. Please also check listings of my friend montsegur - combined regular shipping is possible. For more details on my USA special shipping offer please click robbirob and then the more info button.

AMIGO VERSION COULD BE SEND AS A LETTER (CHEAPER,FASTER) DISCOUNT RULES: IF YOU BUY 3 OR MORE GAMES YOU´LL GET DISCOUNT. THE PERCENTAGE IS (DAY+MONTH)/2 (Example: If you buy the games on 12th June you´ll get 12+6=18/2=9 %). So you can get a max. Discount on 31th december of 21 % :_). The date is the BGG-TIME (CST). I´m selling a lot of other german boardgames Shipping worldwide (Paypal or cash or Western Union). Bank Transfer is also OK, if there are no further costs for me. But the only type of Paypal payment that I can accept is one funded by a Paypal balance or an immediate bank transfer. I cannot take a Paypal payment that is funded via credit card. Non-US buyers: Please also note that the shipping charge will be outrageously high. Probably high enough that it does not make sense to purchase this from me. I have no control over this. Insurance will also be REQUIRED (at receiver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s expense) for shipments to non-US addresses. Receivers outside the US must also agree to assume ALL responsibility for taxes, tariffs, customs duties, etc. If these terms are not acceptable, please do not order from me.

Billabong (franjos) - GERMAN Edition - Condition/Zustand: new + unused (but not sealed) / neu und unbenutzt, aber nicht in Folie verpackt! General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. New edition of a classic game that I had great fun with, back in the day. The aim is to be first to get your team of kangaroos to complete a circuit of the board and into the eponymous lake. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £18.33 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £10.38 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £8.65 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £14.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £13.35 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
